author: MarvTheRobot
body:
While following the guide to build PowerShell on Windows. I've noticed that the build is now installing .Net Core CLI 2.0.0-preview1 but the docs still refer to 1.0.1

Docs -> Building -> Windows-Core.md is the file in question. 

The MacOS version appears to be up to date.
title: Building PowerShell on Windows - .Net Core CLI Version incorrect
